room_title: Escape room "DaVinci Heist" by The Escape Room USA - Columbus in Columbus
room_address: 459 North High Street Ste. 2 Columbus, OH 43215
room_description:
For the first time since 1963, the worldâ€™s most famous painting, the Mona Lisa, has departed its homeland of Paris, France and journeyed westward to the shores of America on a one year display tour. As luck would have it, one of her stops is Columbus!
Given your infamous reputation as a master thief, you have been contacted by a wealthy local collector and offered $100,000,000 to steal the painting. Before the masterpiece goes on display, you must recruit a stealthy crew to pull off what will surely be labeled the most amazing heist in history!
